title: Manage Yard Crane Fueling
description: A rubber-tired gantry (RTG) crane in the yard is running low on fuel. The fleet manager must arrange for refueling.

tasks.description: Receive a low-fuel alert from the RTG's onboard monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system sends an alert that RTG-5 has 10% fuel remaining.

tasks.description: Dispatch the port's mobile fuel truck to the crane's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: A job is sent to the fuel truck driver to go to RTG-5.

tasks.description: Log the amount of fuel dispensed into the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fuel truck operator confirms that 200 liters of diesel were dispensed, and this is logged against the asset's record.
